title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 467.4 - Supervision and engineering
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 467.4 - Supervision and engineering

State Regulations

The supervision and engineering includible in the
operating expense accounts shall consist of the pay and expenses (company and
railroad transportation, lodging, meals, taxi and car fares and other traveling
and incidental expenses) of superintendents, engineers, clerks, other employees
and consultants engaged in supervising and directing the operations and
maintenace of each steam utility function; also office supplies and expenses, including the maintenance of office furniture and equipment. Whenever
allocations are necessary in order to arrive at the amount to be included in
any account, the method and basis of allocation shall be
preserved. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
467.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
